response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds significant worth to me, but I am confident it will also bring immense value to you. Before we proceed, I would like to extend a special offer to you at a price of $750,000. This is a generous offer considering the product's intrinsic value and my desire to ensure it goes to someone who appreciates its true worth. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if you would like to discuss further details. I look forward to your response and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 750000}
